specification_content.section_content:
A sleek handle less kitchen finished in a deep rich gloss with striking horizontal and vertical line work is the embodiment of contemporary style. Polished quartz worktops, large format ceramic floor tiles and LED feature lighting maintain the theme.

A comprehensive range of appliances ensures your kitchen is as practical as it is beautiful.

  • High gloss Lacquer doors with stainless steel finger grip
  • Soft motion hinges and drawers
  • Cutlery insert storage
  • Pull out waste bins
  • 30mm Quartz worktop with 50mm upstands and drainer grooves
  • Miele Pureline Single Oven Pyroclean
  • Miele Pureline Single Oven Moisture plus pyroclean
  • Miele warming drawer
  • Miele pureline microwave
  • Miele 90cm 6 zone induction hob
  • Neff fully integrated larder fridge
  • Neff fully integrated larder no frost freezer
  • Neff fully integrated dishwasher
  • Miele built under twin zone wine cooler
  • Miele 90cm flushline island extractor
  • Blanco stainless steel one and a half bowl under mounted sink
  • Quooker hot, cold and boiling tap
  • High definition LED under cupboard lighting

Each bathroom has been painstakingly designed to create maximum impact. The position of each tile is carefully considered to align perfectly with the sanitary ware, and box section brushed stainless steel tile trims provide crisp sharp edges. Minimalist glass screens to showers and huge back lit mirrors floating on a bed of light complete the look.

High quality Axor Hansgrohe Citterio brassware ensures function is as impressive as form, and for that added touch of luxury, each bathroom features programmable electric underfloor heating.

  • Duravit Durastyle wall mounted WC’s to all bathrooms
  • Polished chrome dual flush plate
  • Duravit Durastyle basin with vanity unit
  • Duravit Durastyle furniture
  • Hansgrohe Focus mono bloc mixer tap
  • Walk-in shower with hinged glass door or fixed shower screens
  • Flushtiled shower trays with brushed stainless steel linear waste
  • Hansgrohe thermostatic shower valve
  • Duravit Durastyle bath with exo fill and wall mounted taps
  • Polished chrome flush fitting shaver socket
  • Programmable electric under floor heating
A bespoke fully fitted dressing room to master suite.

• Gloss laminate door finish
  • 40mm laminate worktop with steel effect front edge and 100mm laminate upstand
  • Blanco inset stainless steel sink and drainer
  • Blanco Crest single lever Monobloc mixer tap
  • Plumbing for washer and dryer

• Hardwood veneered doors
  • Polished chrome ironmongery
  • Large format porcelain tiles to kitchen, utility, WC and bathroom floors
  • Large format ceramic tiles to walls in WCs and all bathrooms
  • Deep section skirting boards and architraves
  • Deep moulded plaster cornice to halls stairs and landings, ground and first floor (excluding bathrooms)
  • Walls finished in Dulux Heritage emulsion
  • Ceilings finished in Dulux white emulsion
  • Cut string staircase with hardwood hand rail, newel posts and spindles
  • Polished chrome light switches and sockets
  • Deep moulded plaster cornice to halls, stairs and landing and principal reception rooms

• Traditional brick and render structures with natural slate or clay tile roof
  • Feature Georgian style timber front door with glazed upper panels and glazed fanlight over
  • Vertically boarded timber up and over garage door finished in Dulux Heritage paint
  • Concrete first and second floors
  • External tap to garage and rear elevation
  • Remote control motorised garage doors
  • Remote control motorised vehicular gates to drive
  • High quality bespoke sliding sash windows
  • Feature timber or brick eaves detail
  • French doors and or sliding folding doors to selected rooms

• Riva gas fire with ornate limestone surround
  • Gas fired underfloor central heating to all floors
  • Programmable electric under floor heating to bathrooms
  • Mechanical extraction to all bathrooms, kitchen and utility (if applicable)
  • Chrome polished heated towel radiators to all bathrooms
  • LED down lighting to kitchens and bathrooms
  • Five amp circuits to family room drawing room and master bedroom
  • External feature lighting to front door and ground floor French doors
  • External power point to rear elevation

• Granite kerbs and feature bonded gravel pavements
  • Large format paving to paths and patios
  • Block paviour or bound gravel finish to drives
  • Rear gardens laid to lawn with feature planting beds
  • Timber hurdle fencing, railings, hedging or walls to plot boundaries
  • External tap to garage and rear elevation
  • Timber gates to Plots 7, 13, 23, 24, 31, 32 and 33
  • Metal gates to Plots 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19 and 20

All BT, TV and Data points are wired back to a central patch panel using Cat 6 cable, a high specification versatile network cable that carries data around your home.

Its multi-functionality provides flexibility for all your equipment such as routers, satellite dishes, Blu-Ray players and games consoles, allowing you to locate them centrally or locally within each room.

  • TV/BT/Data points to all reception rooms and bedrooms
  • Speaker cables to all ground floor reception rooms and first floor bedrooms
  • High level TV points to Living Room, Family Room and Master Bedroom
  • Wiring for cinema room to selected room
  • Provision for a pair of external speakers to the ground floor patio area

Having worked together for many years, PH are delighted to have AV Specialist Wild Copper Audio Visual as our chosen AV partner. Wild Copper can tailor a home entertainment package to meet your exact requirements.

The Alderley Park Estate is protected by a dedicated on-site 24 hour security team that regularly patrol the grounds, providing security and peace of mind.

For an additional fee a key holder service can be offered to residents, providing a first response service to any alarm activations notified by the resident’s third party monitoring company.

  • Alarm system capable of connection to a third party monitoring system
  • Flush fitting polished chrome alarm keypads adjacent to front door and master bedroom
  • Pre wiring for four CCTV cameras
  • External doors feature ultra-secure 5 point espaglonette locking system
  • Spy hole to front door
  • Mains fed smoke/heat detectors with battery backup
  • CO2 detector
  • 10 year New Home Warranty
  • 2 year PH Homes Warranty with our dedicated customer service team

A sleek handle less kitchen finished in a deep rich gloss with striking horizontal and vertical line work is the embodiment of contemporary style. Polished quartz worktops, large format ceramic floor tiles and LED feature lighting maintain the theme.

A comprehensive range of appliances ensures your kitchen is as practical as it is beautiful.

  • High gloss laminate doors with stainless steel finger grip
  • Soft motion hinges and drawers
  • Cutlery insert storage
  • Pull out waste bins
  • 30mm Quartz worktop with 50mm upstands and drainer grooves
  • Neff 80cm 5 zone inductions hob with touch control
  • Neff Single oven with pyroclean and slide and hide door
  • Neff built in oven compact pyroclean with microwave
  • Neff fully integrated low frost fridge freezer (60/40)
  • Neff fully integrated dishwasher
  • Neff extractor hood
  • Blanco Andano stainless Steel under mounted sink
  • Blanco Ellipse single lever Monobloc mixer tap with flex spray rinse head
  • High definition LED under cupboard lighting

Each bathroom has been painstakingly designed to create maximum impact. The position of each tile is carefully considered to align perfectly with the sanitary ware, and box section brushed stainless steel tile trims provide crisp sharp edges. Minimalist glass screens to showers and huge back lit mirrors floating on a bed of light complete the look.

High quality Hansgrohe Metris S brassware ensures function is as impressive as form, and for that added touch of luxury, each bathroom features programmable electric underfloor heating.

  • Wall hung WC to master en suite
  • Duravit Durastyle floor mounted WCs with concealed cistern and soft close seat
  • Polished chrome dual flush plate
  • Duravit Durastyle basin with vanity unit
  • Duravit Durastyle furniture
  • Hansgrohe Focus mono bloc mixer tap
  • Walk-in shower with hinged glass door or fixed shower screens
  • Hansgrohe thermostatic shower valve
  • Duravit Durastyle bath with exo fill and wall mounted taps
  • Polished chrome flush fitting shaver socket
  • Programmable electric under floor heating
Sleek designer Italian wardrobes to the master bedroom and bedroom 2 are carefully designed to form part of the room and become a focal point. A striking feature, not just a practical storage space.

• Matt laminate doors
  • 40mm laminate worktop with steel effect front edge and 100mm laminate upstand
  • Blanco inset stainless steel sink and drainer
  • Blanco Crest single lever Monobloc mixer tap
  • Plumbing for washer and dryer

• Hardwood veneered doors
  • Polished chrome ironmongery
  • Large format porcelain tiles to kitchen, utility, WC and bathroom floors
  • Large format ceramic tiles to walls in WCs and all bathrooms
  • Deep section skirting boards and architraves
  • Walls finished in Dulux Heritage emulsion
  • Ceilings finished in Dulux white emulsion
  • Timber staircase with hardwood hand rail and newel posts and contemporary stop chamfered white painted spindles
  • Polished chrome light switches and sockets
  • Deep moulded plaster cornice to halls, stairs and landing and principal reception rooms

• Traditional brick and render structures with natural slate or clay tile roof
  • Feature Georgian style timber front door with glazed upper panels and glazed fanlight over
  • Vertically boarded timber up and over garage door finished in Dulux Heritage paint
  • Remote control motorised garage doors
  • High quality bespoke timber casement windows
  • Feature timber or brick eaves detail
  • French doors and or sliding folding doors to selected rooms

• Woodburning stove with feature surround
  • Gas fired underfloor central heating to ground floor
  • Programmable electric under floor heating to bathrooms
  • Mechanical extraction to all bathrooms, kitchen and utility (if applicable)
  • Chrome polished heated towel radiators to all bathrooms
  • Chesneys log burning stove with feature timber surround and granite hearth to living room
  • LED down lighting to kitchens and bathrooms
  • Dimmer switches living room and master bedroom
  • 5 amp sockets to living room and master bedroom
  • Shaver socket to bathrooms
  • External feature lighting to front door and ground floor sliding folding doors
  • Remote control motorised up and over garage door

• Granite kerbs and feature bonded gravel pavements
  • Large format paving to paths and patios
  • Block paviour or bound gravel finish to drives
  • Rear gardens laid to lawn with feature planting beds
  • Timber hurdle fencing, railings, hedging or walls to plot boundaries
  • External tap to rear garden
  • Timber gates to Plots 7, 13, 23, 24, 31, 32 and 33
  • Metal gates to Plots 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19 and 20

All BT, TV and Data points are wired back to a central patch panel using Cat 6 cable, a high specification versatile network cable that carries data around your home.

Its multi-functionality provides flexibility for all your equipment such as routers, satellite dishes, Blu-Ray players and games consoles, allowing you to locate them centrally or locally within each room.

  • TV/BT/Data points to all reception rooms and bedrooms
  • Data points to all reception rooms and bedrooms
  • High level TV points to living room, family room and master bedroom
  • Pre-wiring for ceiling speakers to kitchen/breakfast/family room and master bedroom

Having worked together for many years, PH are delighted to have AV Specialist Wild Copper Audio Visual as our chosen AV partner. Wild Copper can tailor a home entertainment package to meet your exact requirements.

The Alderley Park Estate is protected by a dedicated on-site 24 hour security team that regularly patrol the grounds, providing security and peace of mind.

For an additional fee a key holder service can be offered to residents, providing a first response service to any alarm activations notified by the resident’s third party monitoring company.

  • Intruder alarm system with PIR protection to accessible rooms on ground and first floors
  • Alarm keypad adjacent to front door and second keypad to master bedroom
  • External doors feature ultra-secure 5 point espaglonette locking system
  • Spy hole to front door
  • Mains fed smoke/heat detectors with battery backup
  • CO2 detector
  • 10 year New Home Warranty
  • 2 year PH Homes Warranty with our dedicated customer service team

  • Timber staircase with hardwood hand rail and contemporary stop chamfered painted spindles and newel posts

• Traditional brick and render structure with natural slate roof

  • Vertically boarded timber up and over garage door finished in Dulux Heritage Georgian Green

  • High quality bespoke timber casement windows with Dulux white painted sills and feature surrounds to selected windows
  • Feature timber corbelled eaves detail
  • Exquisite rusticated render detailing to ground floor

  • French doors with Juliet balconies to first floor living room

• Gas fired central heating
  • Programmable electric under floor heating to bathrooms

  • Chrome polished heated towel radiators to all bathrooms

All BT, TV and Data points are wired back to a central patch panel using Cat 6 cable, a high specification versatile network cable that carries data around your home.

Its multi-functionality provides flexibility for all your equipment such as routers, satellite dishes, Blu-Ray players and games consoles, allowing you to locate them centrally or locally within each room.

  • TV/BT/Data points to all reception rooms and bedrooms
  • High level TV points to Living Room, Family Room and Master Bedroom

Having worked together for many years, PH are delighted to have AV Specialist Wild Copper Audio Visual as our chosen AV partner. Wild Copper can tailor a home entertainment package to meet your exact requirements.

The Alderley Park Estate is protected by a dedicated on-site 24 hour security team that regularly patrol the grounds, providing security and peace of mind.

For an additional fee a key holder service can be offered to residents, providing a first response service to any alarm activations notified by the resident’s third party monitoring company.

  • Intruder alarm system with PIR protection to accessible rooms on ground and first floors
  • Alarm keypad adjacent to front door and master bedroom
  • External doors feature ultra-secure 5 point espaglonette locking system
  • Spy hole to front door
  • Mains fed smoke/heat detectors with battery backup
  • CO2 detector
  • 10 year New Home Warranty
  • 2 year PH Homes Warranty with our dedicated customer service team
